name: VivifyScrum 2 Dark (Color+)
description:
VivifyScrum 2 Dark Color +

A dark theme and optimised layout who work with the standard light vivify default theme.

 - Distinct color for all the columns of the backlog / sprint backlog.
 - Custom colors for tasks / bug / story / note / improvment.
 - Custom background for the board.

Latest update : 07/2018
